overview: After starting her career in energy funding at Banque Paribas managing an international finance portfolio in excess of $1 billion, Janet moved into an operating role. She became EVP and CFO of Citizens Corporation, a diversified group of independent energy companies with revenues of over $1.5 billion and operations in crude oil, refined petroleum products, natural gas, electricity and energy conservation. Prior to joining RockPort she was CEO of Citizens Gas Supply Corporation, the nationâ€™s first independent natural gas marketer, which she led through a period of rapid growth culminating in a successful strategic sale of the company. Janet is a graduate of Dartmouth College with a BA in Government, and holds an MBA from Columbia Business School.
